directions: Mix oats, chocolate chips, sunflower seed kernels, cranberries, protein powder, peanut butter, flax seed, and honey together in a large bowl using your hands to assure ingredients are well integrated.
Stir milk into the oats mixture with a spoon until the mixture is even in texture; divide and shape mixture into 10 balls.
title: No-Bake Oatmeal Protein Bites
